sentence.Network_en: Ludlam was responsible for making Ridiculous Theatre something of a cult.

sentence.Network_en: Since her death, she has become a cult figure.

大卫教派是一个小教派（cult），这样的小教派在美国多如牛毛，在宪法第一修正案的保护下，联邦政府通常是能不碰就不碰。只有在 …
凡是宗教失败的地方,崇拜(cults)就应运而生.这种情况是早期基143 Joseph Campell,《神话的智慧(上)》(Transformations of Myth throu…

...发户),也许是个wisecrack(俏皮话)或者cliffhanger(吊人胃口/充满悬念的故事),但这决不是我的个人崇拜(personality cult),也不能说我像boor／yokel／hick／bumpkin(乡巴佬)一样孤
售市场却表现相当优异，目前被认为是一部另类经典作品（cult classic）。　　 　 No.7 致命ID 　　   　　惊悚剧情类型的电影看多了，《致命ID》当.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (originally denoting homage paid to a divinity): from French culte or Latin cultus 'worship', from cult- 'inhabited, cultivated, worshipped', from the verb colere

entry.tran: 小宗教组织;(尤指)异教，邪教
entry.def: A cult is a fairly small religious group, especially one which is considered strange.

example.ex: The teenager may have been abducted by a religious cult...
example.tran: 这个少年可能被一个异教组织绑架了。

example.ex: The cult of Isis was carried from Egypt into Greece and Rome.
example.tran: 对伊希斯的膜拜从埃及传到了希腊和罗马。

entry.tran: 受特定群体欢迎的;在特定群体中流行的
entry.def: Cult is used to describe things that are very popular or fashionable among a particular group of people.

example.ex: Since her death, she has become a cult figure...
example.tran: 她死后成了部分人狂热崇拜的偶像。

example.ex: The film is destined to become a cult classic...
example.tran: 这部电影注定会成为风靡一时的经典之作。

entry.def: Someone or something that is a cult has become very popular or fashionable among a particular group of people.

example.ex: Ludlam was responsible for making Ridiculous Theatre something of a cult...
example.tran: 荒诞派戏剧的风靡要归功于勒德拉姆。

example.ex: The bra has gone from being a fashion classic to a fashion cult.
example.tran: 胸罩已经从经典时尚转变为流行时尚。

entry.def: The cult of something is a situation in which people regard that thing as very important or special.

example.ex: ...the cult of youth that recently gripped publishing...
example.tran: 对青年的关注成为近期出版界的焦点

example.ex: Society is entitled and bound to protect itself against a cult of violence...
example.tran: 社会有权力和义务保护自身不受暴力行为的侵害。

means.word_mean: 1. adherents of an exclusive system of religious beliefs and practices
2. an interest followed with exaggerated zeal;

sentences.sentence: "it was all the rage that season"

means.word_mean: 3. a system of religious beliefs and rituals;

sentences.sentence: "devoted to the cultus of the Blessed Virgin"

stems_affixes.word_buile: arboriculture[[n.树木的培植]]男→adj.培植树木的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有开垦的, 没有耕种的, 没有教养的

stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向内+cult教派→在教派内不让别人知道
agri农业+culture培养,文化→引申为养殖业→农业
aqui水+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.[生物]水产养殖
arbori=arbor+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.树木的培植
cult耕种,培养→培养[感情]→崇拜,引申为教派
cultivate[v.耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼]+ion动作或状态→n.耕作,培养

stems_affixes.value_cn: 文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育
stems_affixes.word_buile: cult耕种,培养+ure表名词→培养出的[东西]→人类文化
flori=flor花+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.花艺, 栽培花卉
pisci鱼+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.养鱼学, 养鱼业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼
stems_affixes.word_buile: cult耕种,培养+ivate表动词→v.耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼

sentences.en: That rock musician has a cult following.
sentences.cn: 那个摇滚音乐家拥有大批狂热的崇拜者。

jushi.english: That rock musician has a cult following.
jushi.chinese: 那个摇滚音乐家拥有大批狂热的崇拜者。
